price: 162. Ma mid raaca Raalli gelinta Alle baa la mid ah kan mutaysta Cadhada Alle, hoygiisuna yahay Jahannama, oo u xun meel la ahaado.
arabic: أَفَمَنِ ٱتَّبَعَ رِضۡوَٰنَ ٱللَّهِ كَمَنۢ بَآءَ بِسَخَطٖ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَمَأۡوَىٰهُ جَهَنَّمُۖ وَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡمَصِيرُ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: afamani ittabaʿa riḍ'wāna al-lahi kaman bāa bisakhaṭin mina al-lahi wamawāhu jahannamu wabi'sa al-maṣīru
